GSD.description:
PM: core: keep irq flags in device_pm_check_callbacks()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.110 by commit ede1ef1a7de973321699736ef96d01a4b9a6fe9e. For more details please see the references link.
